Hi all - 

Thought I'd ask if anyone out there might have a "lone" kashira depicting a gold dragon and shakudo clouds on a nanako ground of shakudo, katana-sized. Trying to match up a lone fuchi. If so, contact me privately: swords@... 

Ron
